        Creates an empty shelf slot with 0 width and a specified price

        keyCode - the code for ordering an item from this slot
        price - the price for items in this slot

      • DefaultShelfSlot

        public DefaultShelfSlot(String keyCode,
                        BigDecimal price,
                        List<VendingMachineItem> items)
        Creates a pre-filled shelf slot
        Parameters:
        keyCode - the code for ordering an item from this slot
        price - the price for items in this slot
        items - a collection of items to initially fill this slot with

      • peek

        public VendingMachineItem peek()
        Description copied from interface: ShelfSlot
        Gets a copy of the item at the front of the slot. This method is useful for presenting what items are visible to the customer. The returned object is a copy, so that a consuming class cannot modify the item without removing it.
        Specified by:
        peek in interface ShelfSlot
        Returns:
        a copy of the item at the front of the slot
